plot: Geoffrey Collins lost his wife and daughter to a better provider after losing his job and home. For one summer day in the only place he has left that gives him peace and happiness, he will find out that loss may be permanent.
title: Park Bench
plot_es: Geoffrey Collins lost his wife and daughter to a better provider after losing his job and home. For one summer day in the only place he has left that gives him peace and happiness, he will find out that loss may be permanent.
plot_en: Geoffrey Collins lost his wife and daughter to a better provider after losing his job and home. For one summer day in the only place he has left that gives him peace and happiness, he will find out that loss may be permanent.
